#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
typedef pair< int , int > pii;
typedef long long LL;
#define fr first
#define se second
#define EPS 1e-8
#define INF 10000*10000*10000LL
stringstream ss;
#define two(x) ( 1LL<<x )
LL mod = 1000000007LL;

/**************************Code****************************/

int dp[150][10][2];

string f( int x )
{
	if( x <= 0 )
		return "0";
	string ret = "";
	while( x )
		ret += char( '0' + x%10 ), x /= 10;
	reverse( ret.begin(), ret.end() );
	return ret;
}

int main()
{
	int t, a, b;
	scanf( "%d", &t );
	while( t -- )
	{
		cin >> a >> b;
		string up = f( b ), down = f( a-1 );
		memset( dp, 0, sizeof dp );
		int ans = 0;
		dp[0][0][0] = 1;
		for( int i = 0 ; i < 150 ; i ++ )
			for( int j = 0 ; j < up.size() ; j ++ )
				for( int k = 0 ; k < 2 ; k ++ )
					if( dp[i][j][k] )
					{
						if( k )
							for( int l = 0 ; l < 10 ; l ++ )
								dp[ i+l + ( l%2 ? 0 : l ) ][j+1][k] += dp[i][j][k];
						else
						{
							for( int l = 0 ; l < up[j] -'0' ; l ++ )
								dp[ i+l + ( l%2 ? 0 : l ) ][j+1][1] += dp[i][j][k];
							int l = up[j]-'0';
							dp[ i+l + ( l%2 ? 0 : l ) ][j+1][0] += dp[i][j][k];
						}
					}
		for( int i = 0 ; i < 150 ; i ++ )
			for( int k = 0 ; k < 2 ; k ++ )
				ans += dp[i][up.size()][k] * ( i%10 );
		if( a )
		{
			memset( dp, 0, sizeof dp );
			dp[0][0][0] = 1;
			for( int i = 0 ; i < 150 ; i ++ )
				for( int j = 0 ; j < down.size() ; j ++ )
					for( int k = 0 ; k < 2 ; k ++ )
						if( dp[i][j][k] )
						{
							if( k )
								for( int l = 0 ; l < 10 ; l ++ )
									dp[ i+l + ( l%2 ? 0 : l ) ][j+1][k] += dp[i][j][k];
							else
							{
								for( int l = 0 ; l < down[j] -'0' ; l ++ )
									dp[ i+l + ( l%2 ? 0 : l ) ][j+1][1] += dp[i][j][k];
								int l = down[j]-'0';
								dp[ i+l + ( l%2 ? 0 : l ) ][j+1][0] += dp[i][j][k];
							}
						}
			for( int i = 0 ; i < 150 ; i ++ )
				for( int k = 0 ; k < 2 ; k ++ )
					ans -= dp[i][down.size()][k] * ( i%10 );
		}
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
